类 com.opensource.bitmapfun.util.ImageCache
的使用

  • 使用ImageCache的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.opensource.bitmapfun.util  

    • com.opensource.bitmapfun.util中ImageCache的使用

      返回ImageCache的com.opensource.bitmapfun.util中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static ImageCache ImageCache.findOrCreateCache(FragmentActivity activity, File cachPath, String uniqueName)
      Find and return an existing ImageCache stored in a RetainFragment, if not found a new one is created with defaults and saved to a RetainFragment.
      static ImageCache ImageCache.findOrCreateCache(FragmentActivity activity, ImageCache.ImageCacheParams cacheParams)
      Find and return an existing ImageCache stored in a RetainFragment, if not found a new one is created using the supplied params and saved to a RetainFragment.
      ImageCache ImageWorker.getImageCache() 
      参数类型为ImageCache的com.opensource.bitmapfun.util中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ImageWorker.setImageCache(ImageCache cacheCallback)
      Set the ImageCache object to use with this ImageWorker.
